dmca.title: Copyright infringement - cease and desist
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Wendy Wurtele [mailto:wendyw@onlinelegalmarketing.com] 
Sent: Friday, January 26, 2007 7:38 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright infringement - cease and desist



Dear Sirs,

 

It appears that a website apparently hosted with you, is infringing our 

copyright and copying content from our website onto their urls. 

 

The abusing url is:  

 

http://www.businesslawdot.com/   

 

They have copied content from our copyrighted website
www.lawyersandsettlements.com 

 

It looks like virtually 100% of the content on these websites is a
direct 

copy of our pages. 

 

Here are random examples of their copyright infringement, I could send
you thousands of similar copied pages: 

 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/overtime_homepage 

Infringing url:   http://www.businesslawdot.com/overtime_homepage.html 

 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/lawyers/directory/ 

Infringing url:
http://www.businesslawdot.com/lawyers/directory/index.html 

 

Our url:
http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/articles/00440/printer-fear.html 

Infringing url: http://www.businesslawdot.com/articles/printer-fear.html


 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/fabric-pollution 

Infringing url: http://www.businesslawdot.com/case/fabric-pollution.html


 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/company.html 

Infringing url: http://www.businesslawdot.com/about.html 

 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/terms.html 

Infringing url: http://www.businesslawdot.com/terms.html (looks like
they forgot to update this page - as it mentions their other website
that is copying us: fanlawonline.com - and they forgot to take out the
dba of "lawyersandsettlements.com")

 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/ssri_birth_defects 

Infringing url:
http://www.businesslawdot.com/case/ssri_birth_defects.html 

 

Our url:
http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/articles/00444/trasylol-death 

Infringing url:
http://www.businesslawdot.com/articles/trasylol-death.html 

 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/ace_inhibitors 

Infringing url: http://www.businesslawdot.com/case/ace_inhibitors.html 

 

Our url: http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/california_labor_law 

Infringing url:
http://www.businesslawdot.com/case/california_labor_law.html 

 

Our url:
http://www.lawyersandsettlements.com/case/florida_cigarette_fatal_cancer


Infringing url:
http://www.businesslawdot.com/case/florida_cigarette_fatal_cancer.html 

 

If you need more, just look at any page on their website, then do a
search for the same item on lawyersandsettlements.com.

 

Please shut them down immediately. 

 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described 

above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my registered 

copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the 

information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright 

owner of an exclusive right that is infringed. 

 

Scott and Wendy Wurtele

Online Legal Marketing Ltd.

Justice for Everyone

www.LawyersandSettlements.com
